Name: Unveloped
About the game: Join Anton and Garlo as they travel across the land to stop Angor, a black fairy who develops really bad games. Along the way they run into puzzle's, and Angor's minion's. Travel across the 4 land's of Hopeful Hill's, Land of Heat and Death, ICE LAND, The Summit, and climb up the Tower of Creativity. Key Features: Auto saving after every level Every time you complete a level, your progress is auto saved. Use an Xbox 360 Controller You can use your Xbox 360 controller in your adventure. Replay a chapter At any point you can go back to a chapter that you have visted.
Meta Title: Unveloped: Jan 23, 2018, Lazy Gaming and Full Overview
